snippet.title: HOUND: AUTOMATON - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Hound: Automaton - The Ultimate Multiplayer Hide-and-Seek

Launching October 21st on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3081120/HOUND_AUTOMATON/

Gather up to 15 friends or brave it solo in this heart-pounding hide-and-seek game. As the relentless hound closes in, will you be the last survivor standing? Every caught player joins the hunt, turning predator in stunning, atmospheric environments.

Discord: https://discord.gg/mAcdGFxkjz

#HoundAutomaton #HideAndSeek #MultiplayerGame #SteamGames
